7.5. Abstract examples of Taylor expansions

This can also be written as

\[
X_t = S_{\Delta t} X_{t_0} + \left( \int_0^{\Delta t} S_s ds \right) F(X_{t_0}) + (O_t - S_{\Delta t} O_{t_0}) + \int_{t_0}^t S_{(t-s)} F'(X_{t_0}) \Delta O_s ds + O \left( (\Delta t)^{1+\min(1,2\theta)} \right) \tag{7.35}
\]

and is a Taylor approximation of order \(1 + \min(1,2\theta)\). It will be used in Section 7.7 to derive the numerical scheme (7.68).

Taylor expansion of order \(1 + \min(1,3\theta)\)

The remainder term (7.34) consists of three parts, namely,

\[
I_*^1 [I_*^0](t) = O \left( (\Delta t)^2 \right), \quad I_*^2 [I_*^0, \Delta O](t) = O \left( (\Delta t)^{2+\theta} \right), \quad I_*^2 [\Delta O, \Delta O](t) = O \left( (\Delta t)^{1+2\theta} \right).
\]

Since \(\theta < \frac{1}{2}\) and hence \(\min(2,2+\theta,1+2\theta) = 1+2\theta\) in the examples in Section 7.6, the stochastic process \(I_*^2 [\Delta O, \Delta O]\) will be expanded here. Applying Proposition 5 to this term yields

\[
I_*^2 [\Delta O, \Delta O] = I_*^2 [\Delta O, \Delta O] + I_*^3 [I_*^0, \Delta O, \Delta O] + I_*^3 [\Delta O, \Delta O, \Delta O],
\]

and inserting this into (7.33) then gives

\[
\Delta X = I_*^0 + \Delta O + I_*^1 [\Delta O] + I_*^2 [\Delta O, \Delta O] + R, \tag{7.36}
\]

where the remainder \(R \in \mathbb{C}\) reads

\[
R = I_*^1 [I_*^0] + I_*^2 [I_*^0, \Delta O] + I_*^3 [I_*^0, \delta O, \Delta O] + I_*^3 [\Delta O, \Delta, \Delta O]. \tag{7.37}
\]

By Proposition 6

\[
I_*^3 [I_*^0, \Delta O, \Delta O](t) = O \left( (\Delta t)^{2+2\theta} \right), \quad I_*^3 [\Delta O, \Delta O, \Delta O](t) = O \left( (\Delta t) \right)^{1+3\theta},
\]

so \(R = O \left( (\Delta t)^{1+\min(1,3\theta)} \right)\) since \(\min(2,2+\theta,2+2\theta,1+3\theta) = 1 + \min(1,3\theta)\). Finally, the Taylor expansion written out fully is

\[
X_t = S_{\Delta t} X_{t_0} + \int_0^{\Delta t} S_s ds \left( F(X_{t_0}) + (O_t - S_{\Delta t} O_{0}) + \int_{t_0}^t S_{(t-s)} F'(X_t) \Delta O_s ds \right) + \frac{1}{2} \int_{t_0}^t S_{(t-s)} F''(X_t) (\Delta O_s, \Delta O_s) ds + O \left( (\Delta t)^{1+\min(1,3\theta)} \right). \tag{7.38}
\]
